QuestData.Title: The Return of Baron Geddon
QuestData.Description: Ragnaros is not the only powerful elemental that has re-emerged into our world.$B$BThe dreaded Baron Geddon is leading the onslaught and we must put an end to this rampage.$B$BThe Flameseer's Staff has proven powerful. Perhaps it is powerful enough to weaken him to the point where our arch druids can bind him where he stands.$B$BGo, $n and be careful. Baron Geddon is a vengeful and treacherous being.
QuestData.LogDescription: Channel the Flameseer's Staff to weaken Baron Geddon.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, $n. We cannot afford to lose any further ground in Hyjal.$B$BBy stopping Baron Geddon we will have dealt a huge blow to the enemy.
